EmailTemplate.name: Contract Membership Denied 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: RH Contract Membership Application Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We are unable to complete your RH Contract application because we have not received the required documentation or because your account would be better served by another division.
If you are still interested in having your RH Contract application reviewed, please submit your supporting documentation, along with your original application number.
Any one of the following documents is sufficient to process your membership request:
· Current Business or State Profession License in a Residential or Commercial Design-based business, or the Hospitality industry
· Proof of current AI or IDI provincial registration
· Business ID number
· W9, Federal ID form or EIN number
· Resale or Sales Tax Certificate. If you intend to purchase merchandise for resale, you will be required to supply a Resale or Sales Tax Certificate.
For questions about the processing of your application, please contact the RH Contract Team at 855.513.3380, or email ContractProjects@rh.com.
Kind Regards,
RH Contract
855.513.3380
